title: SunTrust Trims Pier 1 Imports Target Price to $10.00 (PIR)
content:
Pier 1 Imports (NYSE:PIR) had its price objective dropped by stock analysts at SunTrust from $15.00 to $10.00 in a research note issued on Friday, StockTargetPrices.com reports. The brokerage presently has a “neutral” rating on the stock. SunTrust’s price target indicates a potential upside of 15.34% from the stock’s previous close. Pier 1 Imports (NYSE:PIR) […] 
 
The post appeared first on Ticker Report .
